verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:24
verses.text: For thou hast confirmed to thyself thy people Israel to be a people unto thee for ever: and thou, Lord, art become their God.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:25
verses.text: And now, O Lord God, the word that thou hast spoken concerning thy servant, and concerning his house, establish it for ever, and do as thou hast said.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:26
verses.text: And let thy name be magnified for ever, saying, The Lord of hosts is the God over Israel: and let the house of thy servant David be established before thee.
